name: WorkFlowy 360px Wide Page for 1920x1080 Screen Res
description: The screenshot gives an example of this theme applied to two different browsers, each at different widths and with a different WorkFlowy userstyle applied (you can see/try/get these and other userstyles at my profile page).
additional_info:
I find it a useful size for using with the Windows Power Toys utility known as FancyZones that, for free, splits windows into multiple zones quickly and efficiently. I especially use this userstyle with WorkFlowy for a 524px x 1080px zone, but also wider or even a bit narrower. This is best done using a browser like the Microsoft Edge browser, since some browsers limit too much how narrow you can make them.

This also adds styling to the border corners so it loosely mimics a 3-inch by 5-inch "Rite in the Rain" brand waterproof pocket notebook.

Finally, this adds some font selections and styling. Comment those out if you wish.

N.B. This style requires that WorkFlowy's "Full width page" feature NOT be enabled.
